job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: This is a remote opportunity. Only suitable candidates please apply.<br><br>experience with Python focusing on image and video processing.<br>Working with public/private large-scale data sets of image/video <br>at least 1-2 year of deep learning (academy or industry) experience with TensorFlow.<br> Graduate degree on CS, CE or EE.<br>Research experience on computer vision or machine learning.<br>AI on the chip is a plus.<br><br>Kindly share your updated resume at parul@inabia.com and ayushi@inabia.com for a fast response.
